uniol.apt.ui

Interface ParametersTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AptParametersTransformer, ParametersTransformerImpl

    public interface ParametersTransformer
    This class manages a bunch of parameter transformations and uses them to transform a given parameter string to an object of a specific type.
    Author:
    Renke Grunwald

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> ParameterTransformation<T> getTransformation(java.lang.Class<T> klass)
      Gets the transformation that can transform objects of the given type.
      java.lang.String getTransformationDescription(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
      Gets the description of the transformation for the given klass.
      java.lang.Object transform(java.lang.String arg, java.lang.Class<?> klass)
      Transforms a parameter string to an object of a specific type.

    • Method Detail

      • getTransformation

        <T> ParameterTransformation<T> getTransformation(java.lang.Class<T> klass)
        Gets the transformation that can transform objects of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the object the transformation transforms
        Parameters:
        klass - the class of the object the transformation transforms
        Returns:
        the transformation

      • getTransformationDescription

        java.lang.String getTransformationDescription(java.lang.Class<?> klass)
                                       throws NoSuchTransformationException
        Gets the description of the transformation for the given klass.
        Parameters:
        klass - the type of the object the transformation transforms
        Returns:
        the description or an empty string
        Throws:
        NoSuchTransformationException - When no suitable transformation is available

      • transform

        java.lang.Object transform(java.lang.String arg,
                           java.lang.Class<?> klass)
                    throws ModuleException
        Transforms a parameter string to an object of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        arg - the parameter string
        klass - the type of the object the parameter string should be transformed to
        Returns:
        the transformed object
        Throws:
        NoSuchTransformationException - When no suitable transformation is available
        ModuleException
